title: Swiss typeface
content:
Hey there! Whats up?

I need to know some information about SWISS typeface, like who has created, or why it was created, and when, things like that. Does anyone know? I think it was genereated from Helvetica, but I am not sure.

Can anybody tell me where I can find some information about it?

Thanks a lot,

Pedro Alkimim

- [www.pedroalkimim.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130825005142/http:/www.pedroalkimim.com/ "www.pedroalkimim.com")
author: pedroalk

comments.content: Swiss is basically Bitstream's version of Helvetica.
